Posts.Content: Hi Kristalou I had a right breast Mastectomy and reconstruction on August 10th this year.  I had an inplant and am so pleased that it never enters my head that it is'nt real.  My left breast was also made smaller and being 51 it has given me so much confidence. Best of luck and hope all goes well   LOL Maggie G
Posts.Title: Help! Can't decide on what reconstruction to have.
